short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Based on natural sounds and focus mode, create minimalist white noise
short.zh_CN: 基于自然声音与专注模式，打造极简白噪音

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a white noise-based countdown focus software that helps you find your own rhythm in the midst of the work
long.zh_CN: 这是一个基于白噪音的倒计时专注软件，帮助你在繁杂的工作中找到属于自己的节奏
